#include<cstdio>
using namespace std; 

typedef long long LL;

int main(){
    int q;scanf("%d",&q);
    while(q--){
      LL no_of_numbers=9LL;
      LL num;scanf("%lld",&num);
      if(num==0){
           printf("0\n");continue;
      }
      LL tmp,rem,digits;
      for(digits=1;(tmp=num-digits*no_of_numbers)>0;digits++,num=tmp)
           no_of_numbers=(no_of_numbers<<3)+(no_of_numbers<<1);
      LL val=(rem=num%digits)>0? num/digits+1:num/digits;
      val+=no_of_numbers/9LL-1;
      if(rem){
         for(int i=0;i<digits-rem;i++)
           val/=10LL;
      }
      printf("%lld\n",val%10);
    }
}
